channel.title: Portfolio on Bret Hash | Person Extraordinaire
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Bret Hash | Person Extraordinaire

item.title: 24 Hour Fitness
item.description: In order to facilitate maintaining a single source of content for club information, I implemented a custom cron task in Adobe Experience Manager to parse the 24 Hour Fitness API and store the data in the JCR. The pages were generated by using the stored data and injecting it into custom HTL templates.

item.title: August Locks
item.description: In order to create a simplified store experience, we completely rewrote the frontend cart and checkout experience in Magento 1.9.x. Fraud protection, Stripe payment gateway, and a custom warehouse/inventory integration were also implemented to streamline the back office experience.

item.title: F5 Networks
item.description: In order to reduce publishing time, we integrated a custom publishing workflow to convert DITA XML documents to end user documentation webpages.

item.title: Ford
item.description: The main goal of the project was to be able to locally cache Brightcove videos in the AEM DAM and then serve the cached videos in a custom video player.

item.title: Kaiser Permanente
item.description: Custom Adobe Experience Manager Granite Workflows were used to force authors to adhere to strict rules are content publishing guidelines. Multisite Manager(MSM) was used to control content changes in translated Live Copy pages.

item.title: Raspberium
item.description: The best free terrarium/vivarium/aquarium controller for the Raspberry Pi. Features Built on Django Rest Framework Supports BME280 temperature/humidity/pressure sensor! Easy to use REST HATEOAS API

item.title: Rated90
item.description: Built on a hybrid of CodeIgniter and Wordpress, this site shares templates between the two platforms. Using CodeIgniter, the site efficiently manages a 6,000+ player database.

item.title: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art
item.description: Custom integrations for bidirectional communication between legacy inventory and warehouse management were developed for Magento 1.9.x. A custom authentication provider was implemented to tie into a niche membership management system, providing a seamless in-person and online experience for customers.
